name: Besunder
description:
You ever accidentally unleash demons and have your soul leave your body?

Ever have to use your bond with said soul to navigate a strange liminal space?

Yeah, same.

An online co-op 3d platformer made in 10 weeks for the Ubisoft Game Labs Challenge.

Requires controllers and 2 players to play.

Limited server capacity.

By:
Team Lead - Denis A. Racicot
Designer - O. Kaya
Programming - Daniel Holker, Denis A. Racicot, Feiyang Li, Ziqi Li
Art - Marianick Benoit, Katie Schunk, Steven Lee
Sound - Marianick Benoit, Feiyang Li
